<title>Girls in their Summer Clothes EP | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />

<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Girls in their Summer Clothes EP" />
<meta property="og:description" content=""Girls in their Summer Clothes," from 2007's Magic, entered the Billboard Hot 100 and won the 2008 Grammy Award for Best Rock Song. This digital-only EP includes two audio tracks, the “Winter Mix” and a live performance from the 2007 Magic tour, as well as the song’s Mark Pellington-directed music video, filmed in Asbury Park and Ocean Grove, NJ." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://m.brucespringsteen.net/albums/girls-in-their-summer-clothes-ep/" />

	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />

<meta name="twitter:description" content=""Girls in their Summer Clothes," from 2007's Magic, entered the Billboard Hot 100 and won the 2008 Grammy Award for Best Rock Song. This digital-only EP includes two audio tracks, the “Winter Mix” and a live performance from the 2007 Magic tour, as well as the song’s Mark Pellington-directed music video, filmed in Asbury Park and Ocean Grove, NJ." />

yoast_head_json.title: Girls in their Summer Clothes EP | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.og_title: Girls in their Summer Clothes EP
yoast_head_json.og_description: "Girls in their Summer Clothes," from 2007's Magic, entered the Billboard Hot 100 and won the 2008 Grammy Award for Best Rock Song. This digital-only EP includes two audio tracks, the “Winter Mix” and a live performance from the 2007 Magic tour, as well as the song’s Mark Pellington-directed music video, filmed in Asbury Park and Ocean Grove, NJ.
yoast_head_json.twitter_title: Girls in their Summer Clothes EP
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: "Girls in their Summer Clothes," from 2007's Magic, entered the Billboard Hot 100 and won the 2008 Grammy Award for Best Rock Song. This digital-only EP includes two audio tracks, the “Winter Mix” and a live performance from the 2007 Magic tour, as well as the song’s Mark Pellington-directed music video, filmed in Asbury Park and Ocean Grove, NJ.
